name: TDS
title: PHP/Perl Developer
description: Sole developer on the PHP version of the DSL order form Perl mass mail application.
responsibilities: Provide all support for a DSL order process written in PHP.
Managing a mass mail scheduler I wrote in Perl.
Worldship integration support for shipping DSL modems and parts.
Collecting business requirements for PHP and Perl software.
accomplishments: Developed a USP Worldship integration in 3 weeks by myself, the Java team took  3 months.
Designed and wrote a mass mail application in Perl that combined UI, API and a complex scheduler.s
learnings: I picked up a number of good code review habits.
Corporate cubicle life is soul sucking.
reasonLeft: I needed to feel better connected to the product I was supporting.
